required_fields.mapping: A mapping of columns to new column names. Columns not specified in the mapper will remain the same.

required_fields.key: the key name should be the column
required_fields.value: the value should be an array with ints that specify the bins

required_fields.columns: the columns to select, in a list

required_fields.column: which column in the dataset to measure

optional_fields.budget: the budget requested for this measurement
